website_summaries.verdict: A larger set of stainless steel pots and pans from a reputable manufacturer. Copper bottom makes them suitable for induction cooking.
pros: Price is reasonable for the number of pieces included
cons: Special care is needed to preserve the smooth finish and shine of the stainless steel

customer_reviews.title: Are these real T-Fal?
customer_reviews.text: I fell for the good reviews. That was a mistake. My last set of T-Fal lasted 10 years, so I was hopeful. Shipped in a PLAIN BROWN box. I would expect manufacturer packaging, no? This made me doubt authenticity. THREE of the pans did NOT sit flat on my glass top stove straight out of the packaging. Light weight, for sure. Egg pan not in the set. T-Fal -fal quality has gone down the drain. I've already initiated the return. Went out this weekend and bought another set that is better quality and sits FLAT on my stovetop straight from the box. I should have listened to the one-star reviews from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y

customer_reviews.title: If you want a top of the line non stick cookware set that isn't for the oven, look no further
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of cookware and did a lot of research before purchasing this product. If you do not care about using your pots and pans in the oven, this is the best non stick cookware you are going to find under the $700 price point and maybe even at all. This is NOT normal T-Fal cookware, the coating is COMPLETELY different and much more hard. I have owned a few T-Fal Ultimate products for over 7 years and have used metal on them many times, they still look and act brand new. If you are looking for a premiere set of cookware that isn't for oven cooking, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed after purchasing these for a corporate condo. Set includes an appropriate variety of different-use pans; it is attractive and seemingly functional. It's also dangerous. In all my years of cooking, I've never had pans with handles and covers that get this hot. Impossible to touch without potholders....at any burner temperature. That said, the condo has a gas range; unclear if the problem would be so dramatic with electric or induction. Perhaps many of the positive comments are from reviewers with same. I'd like to donate these but hesitate to pass on a potential accident. A really bad decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: One fatal flaw in an otherwise good pan
customer_reviews.text: These could have been great pans. Heavy bottoms, all stainless handles, glass lids, double rivet connected handles... everything I look for in a pan. Unfortunately there is a flimsy portion where the handle joins the body of the pan, rendering the entire pan as a piece of junk. Too much weight in the pan and the handle bends when you pick it up. I hope I can get a refund on these because they are no good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: Square Griddle and Big Pan WARPED in 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this product got such good reviews. All the cookware are nice looking, but no so heavy gauge like Caphalons or good ones, they are rather lighter, which turned realy bad for our Square Griddle and 11.5" Frying Pan, they are already warped in less than 3 months. And how lucky we are, we have glass cooktop. So Basically the warped ones turned out to be ABSOLUTELY USELESS for us. See the pic, there is bubble in the middle surrounded by oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jahan

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers warranty.
customer_reviews.text: A frying pan lid was received damaged. Contacted manufacture, they said not covered in warranty, they could not replace. Shipping container was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the small stuff. The "one egg wonder" appears to be non-stick but absolutely was not. On first use an egg was cooked and egg crud stuck. It wasn't too hard to get off, but again it did not deliver. I've used about half of the cookware thus far. My cook time has doubled. Cooking two eggs takes twice as long as it did with my very old and worn non-sticks. And lastly the thermo-spot. I did not purchase this set because of the thermo-spot, but unless I'm to preheat my pans for over 10 minutes, the thermo-spot has yet to work on the pans I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer2011

customer_reviews.title: Proper treatment makes a great set. Read this review to keep food from sticking.
customer_reviews.text: You need to season these pans before use. I recommend rice bran oil that you can buy in bulk on Amazon. It has a high smoke point, is relatively healthy and doesn't add any flavor. I also recommend Bar keepers friend for when it's time to reseason. If you season properly these pans will not have anything stick to them. Do not use olive oil or vegetable oil you have at home! Everything will stick. They heat well, if a bit slowly.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Teflon peeled within 2 years
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing for nearly 2 years. Even though they say dishwasher safe, I always hand washed because I didn't want the teflon coating to peel (depending on the detergent you use, it can scratch coated surfaces). I also never used anything but silicon cooking tools nor did I cook on anything above medium high heat, but here I am on Amazon looking to replace these because they're all peeling at an alarming rate. Prior to the peeling issue, I really liked these pans. The sauce pans are still fine, it's just the skillets that are ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman O

customer_reviews.title: Handles Reek of Mold!
customer_reviews.text: The set smelled so badly! I threw them into the dishwasher right away and washed with the hot water cycle. That did nothing. I tried wiping down the handles with Clorox wipes. Still nothing. I wish I could get rid of the mold, because I can't imagine having to pack and ship the set back! Unfortunately I threw all of the shipping materials away. My mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: There is no real copper in these pots and pans.
customer_reviews.text: Pros..... The pots and pans cook evenly. They also clean very well in the dishwasher. Cons..... There is no real copper in these pots and pans. Just a thin plating that comes off the 1st time you put in the dishwasher. False advertising!! Medium pan dose not come with a lid and is useless in my opinion. Would not buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I searched Amazon for "best stainless steel" pots & pans. I chose one of the 4 that Amazon listed as "BEST". It was listed as Ultimate Stainless Steel Pots and Pans. When it arrived, it proved to be 100% aluminum. Returning is going to be a pain because the boxing was extremely complicated and I believe the company is counting on customers not wanting to go through the trouble of returning this. I will never go by Amazon reccoomendations again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Best Pans Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been cooking for over 50 years and have gone through several sets of cookware - everything from seen-on-tv fads to classic Faberware. A recent kitchen remodel meant a new induction stove and I decided to treat myself to some new pots and pans to go with it. After 4 months of use, this set rates a "10" in every category. They clean up like a dream, heat quickly and evenly and the handles stay relatively cool. I recommend them even if you don't need induction compliance!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bonasera

customer_reviews.title: Copper is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had this for a little over a month, quality is great. It's stainless so it's difficult to clean without the proper supplies but doable. Great set of cookware if you ask me. The copper in this is a joke though. I've washed the pan in the pictures maybe a dozen times, the copper on part of it has already rubbed off to reveal just stainless steel underneath the 2 micron coating of copper. For the price it's still a good set, just don't touch the handles without protection.
customer_reviews.author: Will Peters

customer_reviews.title: Discolored very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've used most pans in this set since their arrival. After washing and seasoning they do amazingly well at their non stick duty. They're easy to clean, light weight and, a nice grey. Being as they are very light weight, the smaller saucepans tend to wobble or fall when empty since the handle is heavier than the pan and also very long. They heat nicely using just med/low heat and cook fairly even. A large issue for us is, they're already discolored on the bottom. They're turning white where they sit on the gas burner. We have never had them on high or even remotely near high so I know very well this isn't the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: A great non stick set!
customer_reviews.text: After researching many pot and pan sets, I decided on this 17 piece to replace my old Rachel Ray set. It is truly non stick and very durable. I have made fried potatoes and omelettes both of which would stick in my old set with no problems. The food does not stick at all! I do not use cooking spray as it says in the instructions and use either butter or oil. This is a great set and comes with all I need. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan set. Would definitely get drunk and buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This has been my favorite set from T-Fal so far. We had older sets that just needed to be replaced and this was definitely a good buy. The pans have a very slick coating that seems to hold up well and haven’t had any scratches. Mine tend to have bacon, beer, steaks and eggs on the regular, and whatever else I can cook up on a drunken late night before bed, and they haven’t failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hall

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER disappointed in these pans 😭 I spent about a solid month researching pans to put on our wedding registry and finally decided on these...idk why they have such good reviews. I’ve done EVERYTHING possible to try to make these pans the best they could be. I even “seasoned” them with the olive oil and hot heat before using and then multiple times again to try to fix the sticking but nothing has worked. These pans suck...
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: food sticks to the pan, not for Indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: I fell for all the 5 star reviews. looks stylish but worst performance. each every food is sticking to the pan and getting burnt. Was busy to use in the return window time, so can’t return now. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: A rather large headache
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this product we noticed that there were "STICKERS" at the bottom of each pan. My wife has attempted to remove them. Sorry, but the effort she exhausted resulted in adhesive still on the copper portion of the pans. We are both sorry we invested in these pans because of this sole problem. I must PAN these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick set yet.
customer_reviews.text: Had this set about a year. Most of the pans have gotten a lot of use. The square pan gets used daily. There is ZERO observable degradation of the non-stick surfaces even with the occasional use of metal utensils. No scrapes, dulling, or anything otherwise. Just as non-stick as day one. They clean up super easy too. Fairly heavy gauge. The temperature indicators are not that accurate and only reflect high heat. One caveat is that the bottom of the square pan is super slick and slides off my porcelain burners too easy. Paid about 145 on a lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Manhattan

customer_reviews.title: Bottom outside of pans eroded away
customer_reviews.text: We bought these based on the good reviews. After 2 years of normal use and plastic cooking utensils (to preserve the nonstick surface) the pots hardly have any nonstick left and the skillets actually have deep crevices on the bottom outside where the metal has eroded away. I don’t even know how that can happen. We treat our things nicely so they’ll last and we were solely disappointed in how these held up for the price. We just replaced with all clad for double the cost to see if they hold up better. Nothing is made to last anymore. No money in that I suppose. Unfortunately this set is probably better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to like
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans look beautiful! But they are strained/burnt after first use...after seasoning like directions suggested. Handles are VERY hot and I had to purchased holders for them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought budget kitchen wear (even more budget than these) but finally decided to buy a "name brand" item. So far, these things are great! They cook well, clean well and look great! We have found that they aren't heat resistant for long once they're up to high cooking temps. We accidentally ruined one saucepan (lower steamer pan). So, that was disappointing but not a manufacturer defect. I love to cook and these have made cooking a joy! Would (may) buy again depending on how long they last (going on five months now).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the reviews and I was looking for a set of pans that were non stick. A friend had recommended this set and said he had something similar, but not this one in particular. This set was a HUGE disappointment. I spent $200 on these pans and I don't even know if I can return them because I've already used it. Every time I cook I have problems with food sticking, even on the lowest heat setting. I did everything it said to do with the oil and still have a lot of issues. I want a refund, how do I go about getting one?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ramassar

customer_reviews.title: very cheap
customer_reviews.text: these pans were way too light to use. if there was nothing being cooked in them they would tilt and fall off the burner. the handle is heavier than most of the cooking surfaces making them tilt back. t-fal does make good pans but this product line is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Roblee

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Does scratch
customer_reviews.text: As a Chef I have a soft spot in my heart for stainless pots and pans. I have beat these things to hell and back. And they have been a joy to use in my home kitchen. The copper in the bottom works exactly as advertised even on a crappy coil element cook top. There is even distribution of heat across the entire pan. Every time. I have gotten things seared and baked onto the pan and with a light soak and a little bit of elbow grease, everything is clean and beautiful. Ready for the next meal. However they will scratch, but to me that's no big deal. They are tools and are used as such. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S.

customer_reviews.title: Nicks and scratches in frying pans nonstick surface
customer_reviews.text: Firstly all 17 pcs. arrived in box, with no covers cracked. Both the 10 and 8 inch frying pans had nicks and scratches in nonstick surfaces. Surprising seeing how carefully they were packed so that makes me believe they were returns resent to me. Pretty much defeats the purpose of having a nice smooth nonstick surface, very disheartening.
customer_reviews.author: S Charpentier

customer_reviews.title: Typical product engineering problems. Griddle warped after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Typical product engineering problems. Griddle warped after a few eggs. I just noticed the small pan was bent and the glass lid wobbles on it. Unfortunately the pan was noticed after the 30 day refund policy.
customer_reviews.author: Buster33

customer_reviews.title: Received bent/warped
customer_reviews.text: P'oed is a understatement. Just literally opened the box to this. Tell me its not just my eyes I said. The 3qt pot it's warped, and bent. The steamer insert nor the lid will fit.. I love tfal so I'm chocking this up to Amazon warehouse accident.. but this is ridiculous, always bought tfal and upgraded from 2 years ago to this. Let's hope the return process is quick and painless cause I'm really really bummed
customer_reviews.author: Mortland

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the stainless steel set! After one usage, the pan is completely changing in color, looks stained/dirty, and it was very difficult to clean. This material is completely different from another stainless steel set that I have, and does not seem to be real stainless steel. Returning for the anodized aluminum nonstick set since most reviewers seem to be happy with that one. Hoping it will work out better.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 4 weeks now.. This is by far, the most disappointing item I have bought in a while. Please see the pictures, the coating peels of and I am not sure what other risks it might pose for your health. Avoid it like COVID19, don't even look at the price and get swayed. Better you spend extra money than regretting with every swallow down your throat.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Mostly awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I buy TFal for the past 10-12 years every two or three years about...this time I decide to jump from regular Teflon with heat sensor to the hard anodized. I’m sure I was in love unboxing until the very end because the lid I planned to use the most came bent out the box. I wish I could say it wasn’t wrapped properly but this definitely looks like a manufacture defect. I don’t want to return the pots over just the one lid. Otherwise I’m sure I will put these to good use once I adjust to the temperature for my cooking. If anything happens I’ll be back to let y’all know.
customer_reviews.author: Lostnfoun

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well just out of the box so I cant say much about use or wear. Packing was great. I bought the 17pc set and the site pan and the large fryer both with kids are so nice. The set doesn't seem as heavy as a professional set I had previous. The Dutch oven and the griddle pan are slightly smaller than I expected. Handles are comfortable. I will update in a couple of weeks after use. Update 2 months of daily use and no complaints! Now 7 months daily use and no complaints. I only hand wash these even though they are dishwasher safe. Excellent cooking and always easy to clean. No warping.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: Best set for the price. Look no more.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy material (titanium) and cooks and handles well. Even heat distribution. Not worth it to pay more for the more popular sets at double the price, not the quality. They just cost more because they have made a name for themselves with all the marketing. Believe me, you won't regret it. T-Fal is a french well established brand with factories in China, like almost anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pot really hoping that they would be great... Nothing sticks to them and that's definitely what I wanted however I got them maybe two weeks ago at this point and they're already all marked up?! I've been using normal plastic utensils there is absolutely no reason a set I just purchased should look like this. I wouldn't at all recommend buying these. I couldn't imagine what they would look like after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks - Don't buy if you have a glass stove top
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set about six months ago. I have a glass stove top, so I thought these would work great. However, even after several attempts at seasoning and oiling the pan before cooking, EVERYTHING STICKS. I have tried to lower the temperature setting once the pan heats up but still end up with food that sticks. They look great but they make cooking a nightmare. I am probably going to throw these away as donating them would only cause the same problem for some other sucker.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Pots & Pans but Not Enough Lids
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying these new pans & pots. They seem to be of high quality, heat beautifully and they clean up well. (Per the manual enclosed in the packaging, they are dishwasher safe but will discolor.) We replaced a much more expensive home party set with these. The only issue we have with this set is the lids are not interchangeable, meaning two of the frying pans do not have lids. With a little adjustment to the designs some of the pots' lids could have been used on the frying pans. PROS - HEAT DISTRIBUTION - EASY TO CLEAN CONS - Not Dishwasher safe - No lids for 2 frying pans
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Food Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions on these perfectly. I cooked eggs, low eat, rubbed with oil before hand....the whole thing. They stuck so badly! And I scrambled them constantly. It took me a week of baking soda, multiple dishwasher attempts, and DAWN to get it clean, and then it left weird spots on the pan. I attempted again, with a tiny bit of cooking spray after calling the company (had them less than 30 days) and they were no help when my eggs stuck again. I will be returning this set. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scoobyfan

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these 5 stars except for one very scary item. For some reason these are very slippery on a gas stove grate. They slide very easy and if you are mixing something and do not hold the handle the pan will slide. We have had many sets over the years and this is the first one that slides like a shoe on ice. For that reason alone I find them very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Hulton

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a month or so. I cook a lot. They have held up really well. They conduct heat very quickly and evenly. In fact I would say that I actually need to use lower heat sometimes because these heat up so quickly and stay hot. They are very attractive. They feel good in the hand and have a good weight. I find that in general with the normal amount of grease, oil, things don't stick and they clean up easily. If you have spots or light markings in the pans, I find that a quick wipe down with barkeepers friend or bon ami works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE WORST PURCHASE EVER!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst pans I have EVER BOUGHT.!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! Everything you cook will be Ruined. Everything sticks to them even with oil. I have tried cooking with all types of oil and still, it stick so bad to the pans that my food is Mangled by the time I nable to get it off the Pan. The heat disbursement is horrible. Do not buy if you have, return now. Your money will be worth spending it on a set of pans that work.
customer_reviews.author: Penut

customer_reviews.title: T-Fal, what gives?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this is August and began using in October. Within two uses, two of the pans warped! What the heck? I have contacted TFal to return the set (they say they guarantee satisfaction) so we'll see if they honor their claims. I would not buy TFal again.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall & Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Slippery on gas range.
customer_reviews.text: My last set of Tefal non-stick pans lasted over 20 years. This was a terrific purchase and initially these pans seemed great (quality finish inside and out, good sizes). The only problem on our gas range (pictured) is these pans slide far too easily and with such long handles, it's easy to accidentally knock these pans and have them slide off our range. Separately we both felt these are not safe, and we returned them. Damn: I was hoping these would be a keeper for the next 20 years, and I dislike returning things because of the environmental impact. Giving them four stars: if we had a flat convection hob these would be great!
customer_reviews.author: nuts67

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a full set, that’s non-stick and variety in shape? Look no gather
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a complete set, this is it! I had a bunch of different pots and pans that were old and beat up and then I had a fancy pro-set of Emeril cookware but I am not that sophisticated in the kitchen and needed a non-stick easy clean up full set. I searched everywhere and decided on these, I love them and would absolutely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Leslee

customer_reviews.title: One word: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost a year now, and WOW! They have been one of my favorite purchases so far. I can confidently cook anything on these pots and pans and know that I will have no problem with heat distribution, warping, or with clean up afterwards. These are the first pots that I've used that require very little maintenance. They are perfect for everyday use and will definitely last me for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but requires patience
customer_reviews.text: This were my first set of good quality pots and pans I’ve bought as an adult. So let me say first that they’re a HUGE step up from the hand-me-downs I’ve had. They distribute heat so well, and they’re super easy to clean. However, compared to my old set they take SO long to heat up. I’m talking 20+ minutes to get the 2qt pot of water to boil... maybe just an adjustment I’ll get used to but truly that’s my only complaint. Otherwise they’re awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seem cheap and flimsy. Tops don’t fit properly. Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I was very excited to receive this set but I am pretty disappointed with the quality of the products. The pots and pans are pretty lightweight don’t seem high quality or durable. Also, the tops don’t fit properly (they jiggle around and are loose). The metal on handles seem cheaply made and flimsy. For the price the set is okay, but if you’re looking for quality I would go with something else. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Reanne Daylamani

customer_reviews.title: These are best for Glasstop ranges.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a birthday present for my SO who enjoys cooking, but had a lousy hodge-podge of worn-out pans, some of which should never be used on glass cooking surfaces, like the one we acquired last year. I did some research and found these were best-rated overall for glass cooktops. They're lightweight and sturdy. One of the pans did suffer a little acid discoloration on the bottom, but that is inevitable when using a lot of tomatoes for pasta sauce. Other than that these are generally much better pans than anything we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon YorkTop Contributor: Astronomy

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I will use these for years!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using some pans that I bought from Wal-Mart for the last 5-8 years. This was a special purchase just for me, and boy am I happy I bought this set! I love them for their even heat distribution, quick heat up, and super non-stick! I've read reviews where people overheated these pans, but I read the instructions FIRST, and this set is meant to be used on MEDIUM heat. They still heat up very fast, and we've had to make minimal adjustments to cooking times after switching to these pans. Also, as long as you use non-stick cookware (spoons/spatulas), the finish stays looking new! Thanks T-Fal!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Not true Tfal
customer_reviews.text: This set is not true Tfal. Came in a plain brown box and has label on it that says country of origin-China. Did not even open. Sending back. Second set. Wish I could find Tfal sent in Tfal box and not this.
customer_reviews.author: Buckf

customer_reviews.title: This is what happened after using 3 times.  Tfal will not replace.
customer_reviews.text: I used this pot 3 times to boil rice (Success Rice boil in a bag kind) and hand washed after each time. The coating inside on the bottom is peeling off now. I contacted Tfal and they're refusing to replace it. This is the last time they're getting my money. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bloss

customer_reviews.title: Heats well & seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had tfal cookware in the past, and they held up well. Of course, there was wear and tear over the years. I’m still being very careful not to scratch this set because I assume the non stick coating will scratch easily. However, I haven’t scratched it yet (I’ve only had my set about a week). This set seems to be better quality due to it being anodized titanium. They heat very fast which is a plus. I wish every pot had a lid, but besides that I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Do recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received my set today and on time to cook up some breakfast. To be honest, i’m not sure why some of the reviews say that the handles heat up or that the pots slide around on a flat top stove, mine don’t. I did notice that my eggs, bacon, and pancakes did not stick at all while using 3 different cookware pots out of the set.. easy to clean, and put away. One of the pans I did notice did not have a lid that would fit the pan.. which was my only concern.. I would still recommend the set as of now.. will update review upon any found defects or troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - wanted dishwashing safe cookware. Advertised as such but is not.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this cookware because it said it was dishwasher safe in the description on Amazon. I Purchased this on cyber Monday so the deal was OK. There were other non-dishwasher safe cookware sets I would’ve rather had but because I could put this in the dishwasher I chose this one. It arrived today. The product information booklet clearly states that T-Fal hard anodized cookware is not dishwasher safe! So I wasted my cyber Monday deal on something that was not my first choice. Now, I do not get full price if I send it back and I have lost out on all the other cyber Monday deals on the cookware I would have preferred. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kopplin

customer_reviews.title: Best (for cost) cookware I've ever owned. After 1 1/2 years of daily use, still like new
customer_reviews.text: I have not experienced , after 1 1/2 years of daily use, any of the complaints of negative reviews. The smooth base is great for glass-top stoves. Cooks evenly and cleaning (inside and outside) is a breeze, never had to use an abrasive sponge. It's not recommended but I often use a metal slotted spatula in the frypans and the surface has not scratched. I have accidentally left the empty pans on the burner for over an hour and they have not warped. Like any cookware, it is best to let the pots and pans cool before immersing in water to avoid warping. I have recommended this set to friends and family and all are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one negative - otherwise the set is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My one negative would be the fact they slide so easily on the stove; when making an omelette, I use two hands to fold the egg in half and typically have to have a third hand hold the pan still on the stove so it does not move. Have a couple pans that would literally slide right off the burners if not careful. Cook wise - I LOVE these pans; for so long I held off on getting T-Fal because of the price; started with two frying pans and the very first night using those, I immediately came here and ordered a full set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STICKY!
customer_reviews.text: These are not non stick. EVERYTHING sticks to these pans. I have tried and tried to like them, but I just can't. You can have an inch of oil and the food will still stick. Its worse with meat. I was really hoping these would work, because I wanted a great non stick pan set that could go into the oven also. Back to hunting for a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Reliable brand, won't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I really like the T-fal brand. I had it before and it's always been very reliable and good value for the price. This set does not disappoint. I know eventually the non-stick later will wear off. Just make sure to always use wooden utensils and don't use more heat than what the pans can resist. I never place mine in the oven either, just as a precaution. Also, so far I've been hand-washing them. The set has a nice variety of pot sizes. I would have liked one more pan, though.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Superior non-stick performance
customer_reviews.text: This was actually an impulse purchase during the Black Friday event. I got a great deal on this set. They are superior in their performance. These pans are amazing and truly non-stick!! I use the small skillet to make eggs, and to my shock, the eggs do not stick, even without some kind of non-stick oil or butter preparation. The eggs go in, and slide right out when finished. I have decided to hand was these pots and pans because I love them so much and want them to last. They are beautiful and you will not go wrong if you order them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tight before a move and didnt open them till we arrived at new house. Everything was in great shape but one lid rim was bent a little. No big deal was probably from my movers. No issues with sticking made sunny side up eggs in the med pan and they slip right out and cooked many times using the pots. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kathryn Evans

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set for more than 6 month and put it today in the trash can.. Didn`t last long. it says that its dishwasher safe well its not. after the first wash, the nonstick protection was gone.. i wasn`t able to fry eggs wihout huge amount of oil.. spend more money and buy something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I expected better from T-Fal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my daughter for Christmas. The first time they used the frying pan, it discolored and spotted. Won't clean. I expected better from T-Fal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ccindygustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but there’s one big problem for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pots and pans but have one major problem. They are so slick on the bottom that they slide across my enamel burners unless I’m holding onto the handle at all times. I cannot stir something or flip a pancake or remove a lid without securing the handle first. My other pans held to the surface of the burners. A big nuisance and a learning curve. It could be an accident waiting to happen. That frightens me, but I like the pans so well, I’ve decided to ensure my safety by hanging onto the handles at all times. Just a new habit to form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of t-fal. Both great cookware. I bought this set to replace an expensive designer-label set that I bought because it said non-stick and dishwasher safe, and I liked the color. BUT... the sizes and shapes of those expensive pots were weird. So I looked for a better set also dishwasher safe and non-stick. This set costs less than half the other set and performs much better. The pots are the sizes and shapes I use every day. All have a cover that fits. I would buy these again if I needed another set.
customer_reviews.author: ASF

customer_reviews.title: Do Not last Very Long
customer_reviews.text: These pans work fairly well, I really loved them at first. But if you’re looking for something that will last you longer this is not what you want. Ive owned mine for almost 2 years now and a few of the pans are already giving out. I cook a couple times daily. We rarely use metal in them, if ever, and the insides are all scratched up and chipping. I have never put them in the dishwasher, and have always used a soft rag on them. The red heat icon thing never worked, which I never cared. But if your buying them for that purpose I wouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: We had been using the same set of stainless steel pans for more than 30 years, periodically augmented by cheap non-stick skillets found on sale. Our food always stuck to the stainless, and the cheap pans would prematurely wear out. I don't know why we waited so long to buy a new set. I read a product rating article about non-stick skillets that was very complimentary of the skillet that is part of this set, so I decided to give it a try. Our family could not be more pleased: even heating, no sticking, functional, and cleaning is a breeze. It has only been a month, so the only untested quality is durability. I highly recommend these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L

customer_reviews.title: new stove - new cookware
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cookware. I just remodeled my kitchen and got a new smooth top stove. I researched and found that this cookware is recommended for glass or ceramic top stoves. I chose the set that had 17 pieces. It cooks great and clean up is so easy. I just wipe the pans out with hot soapy water and dry them. Nothing sticks and I do not need to use a scour pad or put them in the dishwasher. It is so nice to have a complete matching set of good quality pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne K. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of pans
customer_reviews.text: So I am overall happy with these pans, however two of them scratched fairly quickly after I started using them. I was using silicone tools so I can't see how it scratched. Other than that, they hold up fairly good. Just wish the coat on the inside wouldn't have scratched so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Buy them - and donate your old pots.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Circulon pots for the past 12 years and had to replace them since the coating was scratched and beat up. This T-fal set is amazing. Love the color changing ring that signals the pans are ready to cook. The craftsmanship is great and I am sure these will last 20 years. My favorite part is that all the kids have a vent hole.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Lastre Valero

customer_reviews.title: I love my new pans!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, these pans have been excellent! I honestly didn't realize how much of a difference a pan could make... with my old pans I would turn the stove to level 4, but now I use level 2. I'm cleaning them with a soft sponge, making a point to rinse off any gristle before rubbing them. And I'm definitely seasoning after 10 uses, too, because I want these to last for a LONG time :-)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa&Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Mullahhhh!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice set! Came in a generic Amazon box, but everything was stacked to fit perfectly, wrapped and layered individually to not scratch while shipping. Not going to lie, I bought the set to give the appearance that I’m a good cook that spends ample time in the kitchen but I’m just the opposite. This set does just that! Super high quality material, heavyweight, and non stick as described. I bought a stainless steel set before this one but returned it immediately because after reading more about stainless cookware. I didn’t want the headache... Would absolutely buy again and recommend this 14 piece set to anyone looking to appear to be a good cook!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them :)
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love, LOVE. Did I mention, Love? :) I wanted a set of pots and pans that were scratch resistant and non-stick. I did a lot of research. These had really great reviews so I went for it. I'm not the world's best cook so I have burned a couple of things in the pots/pans. The burnt stuff LITERALLY scrapes right off with no effort (It's kind of cool to watch actually :P) I wash them by hand to protect them, but they are dishwasher safe. I would highly recommend this. The price is great and the quality is excellent. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Tfall is the Best cookware I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Tfall cookware is absolutely amazing. Like anything you want to keep and use a long time you take care of it. They are so well-made and food doesn’t stick. I have used Rvere Ware all my life and love it but this has it beat!
customer_reviews.author: TMSKULA

customer_reviews.title: NOT COPPER CORE JUST A BULL**** STICKER on aluminum
customer_reviews.text: used for barely a month and passed the return date. SO FUN... im a heavy critic about cast irons and my love for there heat distribution AND LONGEVITY and wanted something faster to clean. BUT THESE ARE ALUMINUM/STEEL MIX WITH A COPPER STICKER ON BOTTOM ABSOLUTE CRAP. unsure if they are seeping aluminum toxins from the metal or if it is real steel but sure enough the copper on bottom is not good. DO NOT BUY NOT REAL, key words COPPER BOTTOM = BULL****. copper core is the real stuff vs this metal sticker fugazy for an extra $150 on aluminum
customer_reviews.author: Noah F.

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer
customer_reviews.text: Best pans ever! I found one pan from a competitor that had a flat bottom for my glass cooktop from this brand and knew I needed more! I orgunally bought a different version of this brand that had a completely different bottom. Luckily I tried once more and found this version! Great for glass tops as the bottom is completely smooth. These nonstick pans are amazing to cook with and easy to clean up. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: What we dont like most with these is how light they are
customer_reviews.text: So far these are holding up well and heat consistent throughout. What we dont like most with these is how light they are. The handles are heavier than the actual pan/pot so the balance on these are horrible. They beg to tip over. Also, if you have steel grates on your stove top, these are insanely slippery. They slip and slide off very easily. Not good. Im in between 2/3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neberkanezzeras

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong but hard to clean and a few other things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product amidst all the other reviews since I needed something strong that does not warp after many days of cooking. This is such a product. It is a beautiful clean set and made to last long. Beware however that it is not non-stick, so your food gets stuck as you cook even something as simple as an egg. Also the pan stains after the first cooking both on the inside and the outside. On the pots, the food sticks to the bottom while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Be Positive

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my dad as a birthday gift. My parent's old non-stick cookware was long overdue to be replaced, as the coating was flaking off and rusting. I made them throw them away! They were hesitant to do so, but when these arrived, they were very happy with them! My dad loves them and can't say enough good things about using them. My mother loves them as well...as for the old cookware, my mom put them out in the garden with plants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives meaning to non stick
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap set of non stick pots and pans I’ve used for 7 years and after using these T-fal I see what I’ve been missing. When it says non stick, it means non stick, it’s amazing. I think the weight is perfect for each pot and pan, the pans have a great depth to them as well. I cannot complain, yet, about this set
customer_reviews.author: Addy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my parents since their old pots and pans were causing them so much grief but these pans saved the day! Such great quality, and really are great for cooking anything. Super nonstick which was the main reason for the purchase. If they come back in stock I’ll be buying myself a set. I’d also like to point out that they also arrived a week and a half earlier than expected which was a bonus. I’m absolutely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I use these pans just about everyday or every other day. It cooks well. Non stick frfr. Even if stuff do sticks to it it cleans great and not hard to come off. Only thing the shine disappears fassstttt! Like with one week I noticed two of the pits already had discoloring on it. I did not like that. Now I have to buy something to keep its shine . The pan can really cook in the oven too! I was shocked Bc I never placed a pan in an oven unless it was baking dish lol This is my first super expensive pot set ever too
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pots/pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these about 5 years ago. At first they seemed great. Then non-stick surface failed. Then started noticing chipping around rims of pans (actual pieces of the metal chipped off). Now the bottoms of the pans are jagged metal. You could cut yourself on them. Not to mention the damage to your stovetop. I do not recommend you waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pots and pans. Having used them consistently for a month, they work amazingly. I havent had issues with food sticking since I seasoned them. Make sure to season them or food will stick to the pans. My only complaint is the sticker on the bottom of the pans when you get them. On ALL of them... They took me a while to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: iEatBBQ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this set. We bought a larger tfal pan at Costco and were happy with it, so we completed our set with these. The spatula and spoon they come with are a bit silly - very strange angle on them making them not fit in the drawer or dishwasher well. The pans are awesome though. Heat well, have the spot letting you know when they are heated, and are truly non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fears

customer_reviews.title: READ THE USE AND CARE BEFORE USING ... ;)
customer_reviews.text: These pans will replace a hodge podge of the last four sets of pans I have had. It is going to be wonderful to have such a variety of pans in one set that match. I hope they will tolerate the way my husband uses pans ... I have already informed him to NOT use the pans on HI heat. Time will tell. He thought I got a red set of pans ... LOL ... but I ordered black to stick with the other colors of appliances in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: P A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for around two weeks now. I changed from Cusienartart non-stick pan set; I purchased this set based on its ability to be dish washer safe. That was a key. Thus far, the pans have held up well. I cook nearly twice a day, and I like the silicone handles and light weightness of the pans. Doesn't seem cheap, and it does seem that they'll last at least 5 years. I was always told to get new pans every 5 years, but with these, I may hold out for 7-10 years. Time will tell, but thus far, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY PRODUCT.!!!! AWFUL.!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy product. The large sauce pan warped after second use. I've had previous t fal pans that lasted 20 years. But this set is so thin and flimsy you can't even stir what's in the pot without it flying all over the stove. Very disappointed.!!! Returned for refund.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Preston

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE PANS!! It is my fault for not looking to see if the pans are nonstick, however, in 2020 I didn’t think I needed to check for that. I spend so much time soaking the pans and even having to add dish soap to water and heating them up just to clean them. Do not buy if you want to cook and not just boil water!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These pots are a great value. They heat up quickly, and the coated handles allow you to easily move the pots around when hot. The lids have small holes that allow the steam to escape, so there's no need to tilt the lids. And the pots are all dishwasher safe. The heat indicator on the frying pans is nice too. So these are great pots with a reasonable price. Buy these and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: TanMan

customer_reviews.title: My New T-fal Hard Anodized Cooking Set
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase new pots/pans for my new ceramic stove & decided to try these. They were rated to use with glass top stoves. The color is like a slate gray. They are not too heavy. Easy to clean. Nice set. Would recommend. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Skillet but I Really Like This Cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Very good cookware! The reason for my low rating is because of the missing small egg skillet. We unboxed and used a couple of pans before we discovered that missing so can't repackage and return. However, I do really like this cookware!
customer_reviews.author: D. OGLEE

customer_reviews.title: ... before settling on this one and I am not disappointed with this set
customer_reviews.text: I researched stainless steel sets for months before settling on this one and I am not disappointed with this set. IT IS WONDERFUL! I was worried about the ease of cleaning so I did follow the advice of others and seasoned the pans before first use but honestly, it wasn't needed. They clean up like a charm. I always hand wash them and even stuff that seems really stuck wipes away easily with a good soak. Plus, call me crazy but food tastes better cooked with these pans. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine R. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans. The rivets are coated so you don't have to scrub the rivets. also the outside of the pans clean up very easy. I was cooking eggs and I dripped egg down the outside of the pan, and it wiped right off. these pans are far better than the ceramic coated pans. The last set of pans were ceramic pans (not T-Fal) and lost their non stick properties after about a year, and the rivets weren't coated so you had to scrub hard to get them clean. I hope these will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Cram

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cookware. Product came in a box that was not a TFAL box so I wondered about that. The fry pans are lightweight and can shift on the burner when there is nothing in them that's heavy. They clean up very easy. Handles don't get hot when cooking. I don't put them in the dishwasher because after 10 times in dishwasher you have to re season them and I don't want to keep doing that.
customer_reviews.author: John Waldbillig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, Cooks food well! Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are fantastic! I make sure not to use them over anything higher than medium heat so they still look brand new even though I use them everyday. They are so easy to clean! I hand wash and I'm using them over a gas stove and no warping or damage so far. I've been using them for a few months now. I've since added more tfal pans to my kitchen because I love these so much. Food Cooks well and evenly in them.
customer_reviews.author: Cormak

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pots and pans we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pots and pans we have ever had! We were going to pick between this and the Calphalon set. We figured we couldn't go wrong either way but we had a T-fal set before and figured we would go with them again. Our previous set lasted 5 years and it wasn't near the quality of this set. These pans get hotter faster with excellent even heat. my 2 cents that is worth a penny, this is the best pot and pan set you will get for the money. We are extremely happy with these and have said over and over how happy we are with these. We cook every single day and love these pans even still.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Marston

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to do really well and they are awful! I usually have to hand wash and then put them in the dishwasher on a high heat heavy cycle. Even then sometimes everything doesn’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Eidson

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first set of pots and pans, and for the price point they are AMAZING. That was over 3 Years ago, I still have not had to replace anything till this day. The only warping that has occurred is from the griddle pan, but in its defense I use it 3xs daily literally every day...They are klutz proof certified by me, and they are easy to clean while still serving their nonstick purposes. I strongly recommend this set if you are looking for an entire set for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Worst pan set ever. Says dishwasher safe but changed color immediately. Didn't even use them ran through dishwasher after unpacking. Used 1 time and pans were all destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: hope williams

product_meta.title: T-fal C836SD Ultimate Stainless Steel Copper Bottom 13 PC Cookware Set, Piece, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:13-Piece| Style Name:Copper Stainless Steel| Design:Cookware SetReady for more refined yet still accessible cookware? T fal Ultimate Stainless Steel features the multi layer construction (copper, stainless steel and aluminum) that’s typically found in high end cookware, making it a great choice for any home cook who cares about great tasting food, time tested durability and easy dishwasher safe cleanup. T fal Ultimate Stainless Steel cookware’s heavy gauge multi layer base consists of copper and an encapsulated aluminum core for enhanced heat distribution and retention, as well as 18/10 stainless steel for rugged strength with a gleaming mirror finish. This combination is ideal for promoting faster heat up times and when sautéing or cooking temperature sensitive foods. T fal Ultimate Stainless Steel kitchen pots and pans work best using moderate heat, and their stainless steel interiors won’t react with acidic food, allowing food to retain true flavors. Used to cooking with coated nonstick? Making the switch to well loved stainless is easy—simply preheat the pan, then add a thin coat of cooking oil to prevent food from sticking. Take cooking ambitions up a notch and enjoy the reliable strength and high quality performance of T fal Ultimate Stainless Steel Copper Bottom cookware.
feature_bullets: Set includes: 8 inches fry pan, 10.5 inches fry pan, 12 inches fry pan with lid, 1 quart saucepan with lid, 2 quart; saucepan with lid, 3 quart; saucepan with lid, 5 quart; Dutch oven with lid and stainless steel steamer

Multi layer strength: Heavy gauge base with multiple layers of copper, stainless steel and aluminum for fast, even heat; Durable 18/10 stainless steel; visible copper bottom helps channel heat from the center outward

Stainless steel interior: A well loved cooking surface, the stainless steel interior won’t react to acidic foods; works best using moderate heat; To prevent food from sticking, simply preheat the pan, then add a thin coat of cooking oil

Sturdy handles & vented lids: Riveted stainless steel handles are secure and ergonomically designed for comfort; Tempered glass lids trap in heat and moisture; vented hole in lid lets a little steam escape to maintain visibility and help prevent boiling over
Use and care: Suitable for all cooktops, including induction; Oven safe upto 500 degree fahrenheit; interior measuring marks for easy filling; Dishwasher safe; Lifetime limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,365 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
